com.netflix.genie.web.services.selectors

Class ScriptClusterSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.web.services.selectors.ScriptClusterSelector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClusterSelector

    public class ScriptClusterSelector
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClusterSelector
    An implementation of the ClusterSelector interface which uses user-provided script to make decisions based on the list of clusters and the job request supplied.

    Note: this ClusterSelector implementation intentionally returns 'null' (a.k.a. 'no preference') in case of error, rather throwing an exception. For example if the script cannot be loaded, or if an invalid cluster is returned. TODO: this logic of falling back to 'no preference' in case of error should be moved out of this implementation and into the service using this interface.

    Since:
    3.1.0
